item.title: About Me
item.description: I am Naveenkumar Murugan, a passionate Lead Data Engineer with nearly 13 years of IT experience. My journey in Big Data & Cloud technologies spans over 8 years, where I have honed my skills in Spark, Kafka, AWS, and other cutting-edge technologies. Professional Summary Link to heading Experience: 13 years 3 months Specialization: Big Data, Cloud, Mainframe technologies Roles: Lead Data Engineer, Senior Solution Designer Domains: Banking, Healthcare, Telecom Honors & Awards Link to heading HCL Achievers’ League Award FY'24 - HCL, March 2024 HCL Achievers’ League Award FY'23 - HCL, March 2023 HCL Achievers’ League Award FY'22 - HCL, March 2022 HCL Achievers’ League Award FY'21 - HCL, March 2021 Chennai rock star nominee - HCL, 2021 SPOT Award - DXC Technologies, 2017 Bias For Action - DXC Technology, July 2016 Innovators at Heart - DXC Technology, July 2015 Performance Excellence - Verizon, Apr 2015 Spot Light Award - Verizon, Jul 2013 Spot Award - Verizon, Jul 2014

item.title: Projects
item.description: 1. Greenfield - Cloud ETL Pipelines Link to heading Lead the design and build of complex ETL pipelines in the cloud which delivers the Operational systems data to On-premise Data lake and Data warehouse. Technologies: Python, AWS Step functions, AWS Lambda, AWS Eventbridge, SFTP 2. Greenfield - Cloud ETL Pipelines Link to heading Lead the design and build of complex ETL pipelines in the cloud which serves the data to operational API which is then fed to Machine learning models.
